kuruwita bandara mahathage upades paridi janadhipathi nithignya nihal pranandu matha karunu idiripath kaleya.shri lanka widuli bala panathe wyawasthapitha balaya yatathe mahajana upayogitha komishan sabhawa punarjananiya balashakthi wyapruthi mangin widuliya miladi ganime thiranaya kriyathmaka karana lesata balathmaka kirime niyamayan magin withthikara mandalayata abhiyachanadhikaranaya niyoga kara athi bawath karunu idiripath kerini.indhana mangin widuliya nipadawana wyapruthi mangin widuliya miladi ganimata wada sampradayika nowana punarjananiya balashakthiya mangin widuliya miladi ganima wada labhadayi wana bawa pawasu nithignyaya me niyamayan widuli bala mandalaya mangin kriyawe yedawima rate jathika aarthikayata ha ෙpadu mahajanathawata haniya awama kirimata hethu wana bawada pawasiya.widuli bala mandalaya punarjaniya balashakthiya miladi ganne kumana milakatada yanna methek anawaranaya nokirima merata ha wideshiya aayojanayanta (widuliya nipadawana samagamwalata) badhawak bawa penwadun ෙkamishan sabhawa withthikara samagame sthawaraya pilibandawa wimasiya yuthu bawada pawasiya.rajaye balashakthi prathipaththi ilakka langakara ganimatath widuli uthpadana wiyadama adu kirima, aayojakayan aakarshanaya kara ganima yana karunu itukara ganimata widuli bala mandalaye kriyakarakam thulin nohaki wi athi bawa penwa dena komisama 2020 wana wita punarjananiya balashakthi krama mangin merata widuli uthpadanaya siyayata 20k kara langawimata balaporoththuwa bawada pawasiya.2015 wana wita merata punarjananiya balashakthi prabhawa magin widuliya nipadawimata balagara kriyathmaka kirima widulibala mandalaye kriya thulin ahiri ya haki bawa penwadena komisama adala prathipaththi kriyathmaka karawa ganime dadi awashyathawayak thibena bawa awadharanaya kaleya.karunu salaka balu winisuruwaraya withthikara mandalayata labana 19dina adhikaranaye karunu dakwana lesata niyoga kaleya..
